short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Convert Highlighted Text to Speech' feature enables users to listen to the content they select on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Convert Highlighted Text to Speech" feature enables users to listen to the content they select on a webpage. This functionality enhances accessibility by providing an alternative way to consume text-based information, catering to users with visual impairments or those who prefer auditory learning styles.
